pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========param-store===========param-store works with parameter stores (e.g. EC2 Parameter Store) to resolve specific parameters.It is designed to be pluggable so that stores can be created for e.g. Vault or Azure Key Vault.A use-case is to store secrets in the EC2 parameter store and resolve them automatically.Installation============.. code-block:: shell pip install param-storeUsage=====As a standalone package.. code-block:: python from param_store import EC2ParameterStore from param_store import interpolate_dict data = { 'key': 'my-secret-{{ parameter-1 }}' } store = EC2ParameterStore() result = interpolate_dict(data, store) assert result[key] == 'my-secret-password'In combination with django-environ.. code-block:: python from environ import Env from param_store import EC2ParameterStore from param_store.contrib import resolve_django_environ env = Env() store = EC2ParameterStore() resolve_django_environ(env, store)
